name: Databits LLC
description: Operator of a corporate training platform intended for the development of skills in data science and artificial intelligence. The company's platform offers specialized data programs to help people learn the basics of programming languages like Python and R and understand the fundamentals of data analysis and machine learning, enabling users to develop the essential skills expected when performing a role as a data analyst, as well as the tools most demanded by organizations.
